name: breakfast time!
description:
you're a pretty typical person. doing what pretty typical people do - starting your day right with a happy healthy breakfast. but before you can do that; you've got some choices to make. you've also got some choices to make after that. and during. 

'breakfast time!' is a short, silly, interactive fiction game suitable for folks of most ages. content warning for mentions of sexual activity, violence, and snakes. and breakfast.
